price: 23. Y, ciertamente, enviamos a Moisés con Nuestros milagros y pruebas evidentes
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ أَرۡسَلۡنَا مُوسَىٰ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا وَسُلۡطَٰنٖ مُّبِينٍ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: walaqad arsalnā mūsā biāyātinā wasul'ṭānin mubīnin
